alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Kauai East; Kipahulu; Koolau Windward; Niihau; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 08 at 3:39PM HST until August 09 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...STRONG AND GUSTY WINDS THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... .Wind Advisories are extended through Wednesday afternoon while High Wind Warnings will be downgraded to Wind Advisories after 6 AM HST Wednesday morning. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Niihau and windward coastal portions of Kauai, Oahu, Maui, and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Big Island East; Kauai East; Kipahulu; Koolau Windward; Niihau; Olomana; Windward Haleakala
